OrgName: Clarabridge, Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiary, Market Metrix, a Clarabridge Company, LLC.
activities:
Clarabridge may collect personally identifiable information (PII) with regards to its employees that are employed by its United Kingdom subsidiary.

Through the Clarabridge website, Clarabridge collects Personal Data through the features of its website and in the course of providing a variety of services to consumers and to business partners.  As used throughout this privacy policy, the term “Personal Data” refers to data that personally identifies as individual, such as your e-mail address, name, home or work address or telephone number. In addition to Personal Data, Clarabridge also collects anonymous demographic information, which is not unique to you, such as your ZIP code, age, gender, preferences, interests and favorites (“Anonymous Data”).
orgverification: In-house and third party self-certification and au
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities; for all other data: TRUSTE.
